item.title: Rustic Bread
item.description: A rustic no-knead bread goes well with soups, stews, or just with some butter. Ingredients 500 grams all purpose flour 380 grams warm water 10 grams salt 1 gram dry active yeast Steps Mix all ingredients in a large bowl. This will be a wet dough. Cover the bowl with plastic film and prove for 20 minutes in a proving oven or a warm place.

item.title: Vegan Chili
item.description: This hearty vegan chili recipe took first place in a chili contest, beating even meat-based entries. The key to a perfect vegan chili is to select the freshest vegetables and pre-roast them, according to the recipe.
